ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | imasbas.u | |- ( ph -> U = ( F "s R ) ) |
| 2 |  | imasbas.v | |- ( ph -> V = ( Base ` R ) ) |
| 3 |  | imasbas.f | |- ( ph -> F : V -onto-> B ) |
| 4 |  | imasbas.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Z ) |
| 5 |  | imasds.e | |- E = ( dist ` R ) |
| 6 |  | imasds.d | |- D = ( dist ` U ) |
| 7 |  | imasdsval.x | |- ( ph -> X e. B ) |
| 8 |  | imasdsval.y | |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) |
| 9 |  | imasdsval.s | |- S = { h e. ( ( V X. V ) ^m ( 1 ... n ) ) | ( ( F ` ( 1st ` ( h ` 1 ) ) ) = X /\ ( F ` ( 2nd ` ( h ` n ) ) ) = Y /\ A. i e. ( 1 ... ( n - 1 ) ) ( F ` ( 2nd ` ( h ` i ) ) ) = ( F ` ( 1st ` ( h ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) ) } |
| 10 |  | imasds.u | |- T = ( E |` ( V X. V ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 8, 9 | #P_imasdsval | |- ( ph -> ( X D Y ) = sup ( U_ n e. NN ran ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( E o. g ) ) ) , RR* , `' < ) ) |
| 12 | 10 | #P_coeq1i | |- ( T o. g ) = ( ( E |` ( V X. V ) ) o. g ) |
| 13 |  | #P_ssrab2 | |- { h e. ( ( V X. V ) ^m ( 1 ... n ) ) | ( ( F ` ( 1st ` ( h ` 1 ) ) ) = X /\ ( F ` ( 2nd ` ( h ` n ) ) ) = Y /\ A. i e. ( 1 ... ( n - 1 ) ) ( F ` ( 2nd ` ( h ` i ) ) ) = ( F ` ( 1st ` ( h ` ( i + 1 ) ) ) ) ) } C_ ( ( V X. V ) ^m ( 1 ... n ) ) |

| 15 | 14 | #P_sseli | |- ( g e. S -> g e. ( ( V X. V ) ^m ( 1 ... n ) ) ) |

| 17 |  | #P_frn | |- ( g : ( 1 ... n ) --> ( V X. V ) -> ran g C_ ( V X. V ) ) |
| 18 |  | #P_cores | |- ( ran g C_ ( V X. V ) -> ( ( E |` ( V X. V ) ) o. g ) = ( E o. g ) ) |
| 19 | 15, 16, 17, 18 | #P_4syl | |- ( g e. S -> ( ( E |` ( V X. V ) ) o. g ) = ( E o. g ) ) |
| 20 | 12, 19 | #P_syl5eq | |- ( g e. S -> ( T o. g ) = ( E o. g ) ) |

| 22 | 21 | #P_mpteq2ia | |- ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( T o. g ) ) ) = ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( E o. g ) ) ) |
| 23 | 22 | #P_rneqi | |- ran ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( T o. g ) ) ) = ran ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( E o. g ) ) ) |
| 24 | 23 | #P_a1i | |- ( n e. NN -> ran ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( T o. g ) ) ) = ran ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( E o. g ) ) ) ) |
| 25 | 24 | #P_iuneq2i | |- U_ n e. NN ran ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( T o. g ) ) ) = U_ n e. NN ran ( g e. S |-> ( RR*s gsum ( E o. g ) ) ) |
